data.text: (א) Fret not thyself because of evildoers,
For they shall soon be cut down like the grass,
(ב) Trust in the Lord, and do good;
Delight thyself also in the Lord;
(ג) Commit thy way unto the Lord;
And he shall bring forth thy righteousness as the light,
(ד) Rest in the Lord, and wait patiently for him:
(ה) Cease from anger, and forsake wrath:
For evildoers shall be cut off:
(ו) For yet a little while, and the wicked shall not be:
But the meek shall inherit the earth;
(ז) The wicked plotteth against the just,
The Lord shall laugh at him:
(ח) The wicked have drawn out the sword, and have bent their bow,
Their sword shall enter into their own heart,
(ט) A little that a righteous man hath
For the arms of the wicked shall be broken:
(י) The Lord knoweth the days of the upright:
They shall not be ashamed in the evil time:
(כ) But the wicked shall perish,
(ל) The wicked borroweth, and payeth not again:
For such as be blessed of him shall inherit the earth;
(מ) The steps of a good man are ordered by the Lord:
Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down:
(נ) I have been young, and now am old;
He is ever merciful, and lendeth;
(ס) Depart from evil, and do good;
For the Lord loveth judgment,
The righteous shall inherit the land,
(פ) The mouth of the righteous speaketh wisdom,
The law of his God is in his heart;
(צ) The wicked watcheth the righteous,
The Lord will not leave him in his hand,
(ק) Wait on the Lord, and keep his way,
(ר) I have seen the wicked in great power,
Yet he passed away, and lo, he was not:
(ש) Mark the perfect man, and behold the upright:
But the transgressors shall be destroyed together:
(ות) But the salvation of the righteous is of the Lord:
And the Lord shall help them, and deliver them:
